Main.TextENG: ``...Then, why didn't that brat tell the other villagers about it?@k@vS14/14/VT4Bc_okono1028. Is there any possibility this was a deception on his part?``

Main.TextJPN: 「それはない！@k@vS14/49/VT4Bc_13hibari1011.　隠ぺい行動は万全を期した、その少年が我々の存在に気づいた形跡は無いはずだ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Absolutely not!@k@vS14/49/VT4Bc_13hibari1011. Our cover was perfect. There should be no reason the boy would even suspect our presence!``

Main.TextJPN: 確かに、そいつがたばかったのでは、と小此木自身も言ってみたものの…前原圭一という少年が園崎詩音の共犯となって、Ｒを殺害する動機がまるで思いつかない。
Main.TextENG: That's right. Okonogi had suggested it was a deception... but he couldn't imagine any motive for why the boy named Keiichi Maebara would become an accomplice of Shion Sonozaki and kill R.

Main.TextJPN: だが、…何かが、引っかかる。…あるいはもし、Ｒが自分たちの暗躍を察知して、こちらの情報をその少年に打ち明けていたとしたら？
Main.TextENG: But... something stuck out. ...What if R had somehow sensed their secret maneuvers and shared information with the boy?

Main.TextJPN: 可能性としては低いが、それが事実ならば振り回されている自分たちこそ、いい面の皮ということになる…。
Main.TextENG: It's unlikely, but if there's any truth to it then they were the ones who'd been tricked...

Main.TextJPN: 「…隊長。まだ疑うなら、今すぐその少年を拘束するか？@k@vS14/49/VT4Bc_13hibari1013.　現状なら簡単に拉致出来ると思うが……」
Main.TextENG: ``...Commander. If you have any doubts, why don't we capture the boy immediately?@k@vS14/49/VT4Bc_13hibari1013. I think it would be pretty easy to abduct him in the current circumstances...``

Main.TextJPN: 「そいつは三佐の許可がなけりゃできん！@k@vS14/14/VT4Bc_okono1030.　それに、拉致ともなれば警察がその犯人捜査に乗り出すことになって、色々厄介事が増えるだけだ」
Main.TextENG: ``We can't do that without approval from the Major!@k@vS14/14/VT4Bc_okono1030. Plus, if he were to be kidnapped, the police would begin investigating the matter and that would only add to our troubles.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ともあれ、念のためだ。…そのガキの所在と動向を探れ！@k@vS14/14/VT4Bc_okono1032.　それと、村の捜索に全力を傾けろ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Anyway, just in case... monitor this boy's whereabouts and activities!@k@vS14/14/VT4Bc_okono1032. And do everything you can to search the village!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「隊長、…ひょっとして、Ｒを村の外に拉致した可能性はないでしょうか？@k@vS14/00/hiba0111006.　園崎家以外となると、それに適した場所が思い当たりません」
Main.TextENG: ``Commander... is there any possibility that R is being held outside the village?@k@vS14/00/hiba0111006. Aside from the Sonozaki household, I can't think of any other suitable location.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…思考を硬直化させるな！@k@vS14/14/223400030.　もっとほかの可能性も探り出せ！！@k@vS14/14/223400031.　…そもそも、真昼間に小娘ひとりが誰にも見つからずに、村外にＲを連れ出せるわけがないだろう！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Keep your thoughts more flexible!@k@vS14/14/223400030. Explore the other possibilities!!@k@vS14/14/223400031. ...Besides, how could someone take R out of the village in the middle of the day without anyone noticing?!``

Main.TextJPN: 小此木の、長く錆び付いていた野生の勘が警鐘を鳴らす。
Main.TextENG: Okonogi's rusty yet wild instincts were sounding an alarm.

Main.TextJPN: …古手梨花を拉致した、という園崎詩音の意図は、別にあるのではないか。…こちらが先手を打つつもりで、逆に先手を取られた形になっていることが、妙に気になった。
Main.TextENG: ...What if Shion Sonozaki had other reasons for abducting Rika Furude? ...He was strangely troubled because they had planned to make the first move, yet they were now reacting to someone else's first move.

Main.TextJPN: 「……そういや、警視庁の公安がうろちょろしていたそうだな。@k@vS14/14/223400033.興宮の宿泊地に所在は確認しているか？」
Main.TextENG: ``...That reminds me, that MPD Public Security guy is apparently still hanging around.@k@vS14/14/223400033. Can we identify where he's staying in Okinomiya?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…おそらく。@k@vS14/00/ugu0111004.確認させます」
Main.TextENG: ``...Most likely.@k@vS14/00/ugu0111004. I'll double check.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あと、富竹二尉の所在はどうなってる？@k@vS14/14/223400035.　まだ行方は見つからないのか？！」
Main.TextENG: ``And how about the search for First Lieutenant Tomitake?@k@vS14/14/223400035. We still haven't found him yet?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ま、まだです…。@k@vS14/00/hiba0111008.沼周辺をくまなく捜査しましたが、浮かび上がった気配も、沈んだ様子も見当たりません」
Main.TextENG: ``N-not yet...@k@vS14/00/hiba0111008. We've searched the entire area around the swamp, but there are no signs of anything rising up, and we can't locate anything that may have sunken down.``
``Gh...!!@k@vS14/14/223400037. Wait, hold on.@k@vS14/14/223400038. ...The Major got a phone call just now, right?@k@vS14/14/223400039. From Tokyo...``

Main.TextJPN: 「それが、…なにか？」
Main.TextENG: ``What about it...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…警視庁の公安がこっちに張り出してる…てことは…」
Main.TextENG: ``...MPD Public Security's been dispatched here... meaning...``

Main.TextJPN: 「しまった、――やられたっ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Shit... we've been had!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…さぁて、もう後戻りはできんぞい」
Main.TextENG: ``Well, we can't turn back now.``

Main.TextJPN: 「へっへへへ、さぁてこれで大山鳴動して何が出るっすかね…」
Main.TextENG: ``Heh heh heh heh, let's see what happens next...``

Main.TextJPN: 熊谷は、武者震いをして見せた。
Main.TextENG: Kumagai was trembling with excitement.

Main.TextJPN: 「園崎詩音の様子は？」
Main.TextENG: ``How is Shion Sonozaki?``

Main.TextJPN: 「落ち着いてます。@k@vS14/19/223100023.…というか、思いっきり力抜いてますね。@k@vS14/19/223100024.さすが昔、拘置所に放り込まれたことがあるって言うだけあって、余裕かましていびきかいて寝てますよ」
Main.TextENG: ``She's calmed down.@k@vS14/19/223100023. ...Or perhaps I should say, she's completely drained of strength.@k@vS14/19/223100024. She said she was thrown in jail in the past, so she was able to sleep comfortably.``

Main.TextJPN: 「はっはっは！@k@vS14/11/220700237.　さすがは鬼娘、豪胆ぶりは母親譲りってやつですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``Ha ha ha!@k@vS14/11/220700237. I'd expect no less from the demon girl. She must've inherited that audacious bravado from her mother?``

Main.TextJPN: 驚き呆れると同時に、…素直に感心する。
Main.TextENG: While he was surprised... at the same time, he was impressed.

Main.TextJPN: どんなに場数を重ねたところで、警察の世話になるのはいやなものだ。それなのに、ただ仲間の安否を図るために、自分を捨ててでも犠牲になろうと思えるとは…。
Main.TextENG: No matter how much experience she may have had, nobody wants to be stuck in police custody. And yet, sacrificing yourself just to ensure your friends' safety...

Main.TextJPN: 「熊ちゃん。@k@vS14/11/220700239.私は通信センターの方へ様子を見てきます。@k@vS14/11/220700240.ここは絶対に死守してください」
Main.TextENG: ``Kuma-chan,@k@vS14/11/220700239. I'm going to check the communication center.@k@vS14/11/220700240. Hold down the fort.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うおっす！！@k@vS14/19/223100026.　死んでも誰も通さないです！！」
Main.TextENG: ``You bet!!@k@vS14/19/223100026. Nobody will get through here, over my dead body!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…後のわしの役目は、北条鉄平の司法解剖じゃな。@k@vS14/00/223000027.面子は全部ワシの子飼いで固めたから、ミクロンのごまかしも見逃さん！！@k@vS14/00/223000028.　熊谷、ここは頼むぞ！」
Main.TextENG: ``...All I have to do now is take care of Teppei Houjou's official autopsy.@k@vS14/00/223000027. All the coroners I called here are on my side, so I won't allow even the tiniest bit of deception to slip by!!@k@vS14/00/223000028. Kumagai, take care of this place, okay?``

Main.TextJPN: 「任してくださいッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``You can count on me!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 熊谷は親指を立ててニヤリと不敵に笑うと、取調室へと入って扉を閉める。逮捕拘留から、４８時間。…偶然か必然かはともかく、それが自分たちに与えられた戦いの制限時間だった。
Main.TextENG: Kumagai gave a big grin and a thumbs up, then entered the interrogation room and closed the door. Forty-eight hours in detention. ...Whether it was a coincidence or inevitable, that was the time limit of the battle entrusted to them.

Main.TextJPN: そして、大石は通信センターのフロアに入っていった。
Main.TextENG: Then, Ooishi entered the floor of the communications center.

Main.TextJPN: 無線や電話は、まず最初にここに集められる。昼間の時間帯なら代表窓口も電話を取るが、窓口が閉まってる時間は通信センターが取る。
Main.TextENG: All radio communications and phone calls pass through there first. During business hours, each section answers its own phone calls, but when they aren't open, the communication center answers them instead.

Main.TextJPN: 「どうですかこちらは」
Main.TextENG: ``How's it going here?``

Main.TextJPN: 「はい。@k@vS14/00/centA11002.ついさっき外線経由が刑事課の直通番号に一本」
Main.TextENG: ``Well...@k@vS14/00/centA11002. there was an outside call for forensics calling directly just a few minutes ago.``

Main.TextJPN: 「相手は」
Main.TextENG: ``Who called?``

Main.TextJPN: 「県警本部、大高警部です」
Main.TextENG: ``It was Chief Inspector Ootaka.``

Main.TextJPN: 大石はにやりと笑った。
Main.TextENG: Ooishi grinned.

Main.TextJPN: どうやら敵が動き出したらしい。敵は警察内部を買収してスパイを持つという。…そいつがどうやらまんまと動き出したらしい。
Main.TextENG: The enemy had started to move. They must have bribed someone inside the police department to be their spy. ...And he had started to move, just as they planned.

Main.TextJPN: しかし、それがまさか、あの大高くんだったとはねぇ。
Main.TextENG: Ooishi was surprised to learn that it had been Ootaka.

Main.TextJPN: 大高はインテリを鼻にかけたようないけ好かない男で、現場経験第一主義の大石とは真っ向から対立している男だ。かつて大石が県警にいた頃も犬猿の仲だった。
Main.TextENG: Ooishi had never liked Ootaka, because he constantly boasted about his academic background and always opposed Ooishi, who believes in relying on experience. They didn't get along at all when they worked together at the prefectural police department.

Main.TextJPN: 「通話が終わったようです」
Main.TextENG: ``The phone call has ended.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…熊ちゃんに聞いてみよう。@k@vS14/11/220700246.『ピ、ポ、パ！』と、…もしもし？@k@vS14/11/220700247.　おおぉっと、大丈夫、私ですよ。@k@vS14/11/220700248.いかがでしたか？」
Main.TextENG: ``I'm going to ask Kuma-chan.@k@vS14/11/220700246. Let's see... hello?@k@vS14/11/220700247. Oh, it's me, don't worry.@k@vS14/11/220700248. So, how was it?``

Main.TextJPN: 「あっはっはっは！@k@vS14/19/223100029.　もう対応が何から何まで全てマニュアルどおりでしたね！@k@vS14/19/223100030.　あの人、相当頭に来てますよ。@k@vS14/19/223100031.署長の出勤を待って、朝一でこっちに直接踏み込んでくるそうです」
Main.TextENG: ``Aahahaha!@k@vS14/19/223100029. All his responses were straight out of the manual!@k@vS14/19/223100030. He must be so pissed.@k@vS14/19/223100031. He'll come here as soon as the marshal gets in.``

Main.TextJPN: 「相変わらず、事を派手にしたがる性分だなぁ。@k@vS14/11/220700250.てめぇの体ひとつで喧嘩もできないんですかねぇ。@k@vS14/11/220700251.んっふっふ！」
Main.TextENG: ``That's so like him.@k@vS14/11/220700250. He can't even fight by himself.@k@vS14/11/220700251. Nfu fu fu!``

Main.TextJPN: 「いよいよ本格的になって来ましたねぇ！@k@vS14/19/223100033.　言葉の端々になにやらきな臭いものを感じてきますよ！！@k@vS14/19/223100034.　さぁ、次どう出るかが楽しみですよ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Things are finally getting serious!@k@vS14/19/223100033. I could smell something nasty in everything he said!!@k@vS14/19/223100034. Now, I'm looking forward to seeing whatever comes next~!!``

Main.TextJPN: さぁて、面白くなってきましたよぅ。次は何が来る？　ほらほら鬼さんこちら。もっと踏み込んでいらっしゃい！
Main.TextENG: Well, things are getting interesting now. What's up next? Hey, demons, over here. Come further in!

Main.TextJPN: 「……ん…。@k@vS14/11/VT4Bc_oishi1040.とはいえ、大高のバカが来るとなると…一応、念には念を押しておきますかね。@k@vS14/11/VT4Bc_oishi1041.あぁもうこんな時間、まだ残ってくれているといいんだけど…」
Main.TextENG: ``...Mmm...@k@vS14/11/VT4Bc_oishi1040. Although, that fool Ootaka may come here eventually... keep that in mind, just in case.@k@vS14/11/VT4Bc_oishi1041. Aah, look at the time! I hope he's still there...``

Main.TextJPN: そう呟きながら、壁時計の時間を確かめて受話器を取り上げようとした…その時。
Main.TextENG: As he whispered that, he checked the clock and then tried to pick up the handset... but just then.

Main.TextJPN: 「……あ、そういえば大石さん。@k@vS14/00/centA11006.祭りの日の遺失物扱いだってことで、雛見沢町会から鞄を預かっていますよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Oh by the way, Ooishi-san.@k@vS14/00/centA11006. I received a bag from the Hinamizawa town council that someone apparently lost on the day of the festival.``

Main.TextJPN: 「一応、確認しましたけどね。@k@vS14/00/centA11008.どうやらカメラと、フィルムの類ですね…。@k@vS14/00/centA11009.どうしましょうか？」
Main.TextENG: ``I checked it earlier.@k@vS14/00/centA11008. There's apparently a camera and some kind of film.@k@vS14/00/centA11009. What should we do about it?``
